text: James "Jimmy" Bower (born September 19, 1968) is an American guitarist and drummer from New Orleans, Louisiana. He is known for his work with pioneering sludge metal bands Eyehategod, Crowbar, Down, and Superjoint Ritual, being a founding member of all but Crowbar. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable" |- !Band
